effect.sun-moon: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.

short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the opposing Pokémon, which harshly lowers their Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the opposing Pokémon, which harshly lowers their Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the opposing Pokémon, which harshly lowers their Speed stat.
